custom-sql.sql: SELECT {BookmarksEntry.*} FROM BookmarksEntry LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = BookmarksEntry.entryId) WHERE (AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM BookmarksEntry WHERE (BookmarksEntry.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksEntry.folderId = ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM BookmarksFolder WHERE (BookmarksFolder.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksFolder.parentFolderId = ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM BookmarksEntry WHERE (BookmarksEntry.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksEntry.folderId = ?) AND (BookmarksEntry.status = ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM BookmarksFolder WHERE (BookmarksFolder.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksFolder.parentFolderId = ?) AND (BookmarksFolder.status = ?)
SELECT {BookmarksFolder.*} FROM BookmarksFolder LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = BookmarksFolder.folderId) WHERE (AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL)
SELECT BookmarksEntry.entryId AS modelId, BookmarksEntry.name AS modelName, 1 AS modelFolder FROM BookmarksEntry WHERE (BookmarksEntry.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksEntry.folderId = ?)
SELECT BookmarksFolder.folderId AS modelId, BookmarksFolder.name AS modelName, 0 AS modelFolder FROM BookmarksFolder WHERE (BookmarksFolder.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksFolder.parentFolderId = ?)

SELECT BookmarksEntry.entryId AS modelId, BookmarksEntry.name AS modelName, 1 AS modelFolder FROM BookmarksEntry WHERE (BookmarksEntry.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksEntry.folderId = ?) AND (BookmarksEntry.status = ?)

SELECT BookmarksFolder.folderId AS modelId, BookmarksFolder.name AS modelName, 0 AS modelFolder FROM BookmarksFolder WHERE (BookmarksFolder.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksFolder.parentFolderId = ?) AND (BookmarksFolder.status = ?)
